dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 690 IH: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to implement Salmonella framework for raw poultry products.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Mann (for himself and Mr. Womack) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to implement Salmonella framework for raw poultry products.

section.header: Prohibition on use of Federal funds to implement Salmonella framework for raw poultry products
section.text: No Federal funds may be used to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the proposed rule and proposed determination entitled Salmonella Framework for Raw Poultry Products published by the Food Safety and Inspection Service of the Department of Agriculture in the Federal Register on August 7, 2024 (89 Fed. Reg. 64678 et seq.).
